values: it's been such a long time since i've been on here. ahh it feels good.a lot has been going on. let's see i'm going to start a little jewelry business, K and I are great, Kayla can walk, well kind of. The most recent event is my dad and brother moving here. They came in yesterday and they look so different. I hope that that they like it here. does anyone use livejournal anymore?

well i got off work early cause of the snow. life has been just that life. i've been feeling a little stressed and have had trouble sleeping, but i think that jazzercise will help with that. i hope that cee and i will be paying a visit to vegas cause i really want to. well i gotta head out. things are great. besides the stress.

it's been a very long time since i've written in this journal. i feel rather bad actaully, but i'm making it up to you. i've had alot going on. in april my godson, kaeden was born. i was there. he is the most beautiful thing that i've seen. i try to see him every week. i just can't seem to keep away. kaleo and i are together and happy. things are moving in a great direction. i've been looking for a new job. since i don't like my current one. money is a big issue. but i went on an interview monday keep your fingers crossed for me. i love you all and i hope to write more. i'm excited about cee's halloween party on the 1st of nov. i cant wait to dress up like amy winehouse. lol.

it's been a long time since i've posted. well my birthday was great, new year was radical too. things with my guy and i are good. i'm really happy. i got a new car like a month ago, since the old one wasn't up to par. i love my new car. it seems like things are just pickin up. i'm going to be a god mom. my girlfriend is having a baby. i just may be a bridesmaid too. cool huh. kayla is doing well, still not walking, but she really feels better. well i should go, gotta see the damage on myspace. it's been a couple of months since i've been on.

well my weekend went very well. on friday i went out with kaleo.he blindfolded me and we went to a rest. called sweet water. it was very nice. we talked about everything. and apparently he felt as if we have been dating since the beginning of time (the summer). but nothing was truly official. so i asked him the smart question of so am i your girlfriend now and he looked at me like a dee-dee-dee and said we are dating. so i'm a girlfriend. he said it if looks like a duck, smells like a duck... there for we have been an item for a minute in his eyes. since june by his opinion. so i'm a girlfriend. although nothing really feels different. i mean he totally went through the line that we went on vaycay together (homecoming), he met my friends, see each other just about every weekend. so logically one could think that. so i felt like a dum-dum, but he understood my logic. i think that he understood my feelings too. but regardless of the technicality we are courting. lol! 
work is work. i wish i were home just chillin. arrg!

i'm so excited and nervous i cannot contain myself. i've gone out with this kid every weekend for the last 6 months, why would i be nervous about a date? breath, breath. it's like any other weekend. i'm just sitting here begging for it to turn 5 so i can drive home and get ready to see him. it seems like forever although it's only been 3 days since i've seen him. omg what is happening to me. all of my girlies are so excited for me, seeing that being with kaleo is a major good thing. it's nice to re-find someone and just to click. even when you are scared half to death about being hurt again. but life can be painful, you must look for the light within.and he is my sparkler.i just knew that things would change when he and spent 4th of july with me. that watching those fireworks i just knew. we've had alot of those teen romance novel moments. and it makes me smile. i just can't stop my heart. ohhhhh breathe! well work is slowly coming to an end, which makes me even happier. this week just seemed to go on forever. i dunno what i'm doing for turkey day. dinner with my family. it's my least fav holiday. celebrating the beginning of the masacre of a whole nation of people. but hey what can ya do? well i think will get back to doing something productive.

tonight is my date. omg! yesterday i didn't go to h&m. i went to ross and i found a sweater. it was very nice. i'm gonna wear it tonight. he still won't tell me where we're going. my guess is his apartment for dinner. oh please let it be sushi. ahhhhh (girlie scream)!

today has been rainy, but i like. it last night was very interesting kaleo and i spent a minute on the phone. talking about life and goofin off. i have an official date tomorrow. so excited. i haven't had a official date in a long time. and he won't tell me where we are going? either he doesn't know yet, it's a good surprise, or it's pizza hut. lol! either way i will write about it later or semi write about it. work is work. filling my days with hot tea and standing around the water cooler. i still need to find a dress for the christmas festivities. that'll be my goal until dec 6 (the day before the party). tonight i will do a lil shopping for some clothes for the winter.

it's strange that at 22 most of my friends are/ were engaged or married and or knocked up and me well marriage isn't on the menu at this point. you have to find a groom and make it work. and knocked up... yeah not so much, nor would i want it at his point a pup is enough. it makes me wonder am i on the right track? a year ago i wanted to be one of my friends. planning a wedding adn all that jazz, but now it doesn't quite suit me yet. maybe i'm still a kid, a kid enjoying life. a kid that found a new sport... BINGO! i won a couple of weeks ago, won 13 bucks. i play with my mom sometimes. it's so interesting walking in seeing people of all walks of life praying for one number with their lucky trinket. and no i don't have one. my car is in need of retirement. i think i will put her in a nursing home. well nough writing.

it has been forever since i have written. mostly because i was blocked at work and because it thought v was reading this journal. well i hav/had a crush on a boy. he's really smart and funny, but i think that more time is needed to really make anything happen. there are a few rough edges. but i think just being friends is best. kayla is still sick. really sick, but i am taking care of her as much as i can and giving her all my love. i am so exicited for homecoming. i hope to go on a ghost tour friday night. so please readers if you are interested refer to facebook. so much happened during the summer well the past couple of months. i hope to write more in the future. work has been going well. i am planning the christmas party this year. it is james bond themed. i need to print out the inivations that i designed. i am thinking about going back to school for graphic design and a masters in comm. my mom thinks that the medical field is where it's at, but i hate medicine and well to be honest touching sick people that i don't know. well i hope that everyone is ok. and i wish that i would have been more consistent with writing.

well the month is close to being over and the summer begins today. and news i am picking up kaleo from the airport. should be interesting i think. me and bwi... enough said. well today has been ok. i have been improving from the break up still. i miss my friend, but i don't think that person still exists. oh well you just can't make people stay the same. well such is life, have to move on or it will swallow you alive. here's to a friend and to wild mouse.

well i wish that i was kayla today. i just really don't want to be at work. and it's only wed. and i am just so blah! but i know that the weekend will be better than this week. i just really have been tired. and i don't want to make the same mistakes. argg!

well lets see it's been practically a month since i have spoken to him. and i just can't believe how things just turned into shit, because he was weak. that he was dishonest and has really yet to realize the pain he caused me or fix the situation. that my heart is torn as he goes on believing that he will be some famous recording engineer, when i wanted him to be a loving boyfriend and possibly more. but it's almost a week before it makes month #2 and i found myself looking through my old box.

reading through letters of "i love you" and "lets have a family one day." all his dreams included me, but i guess i wasn't what he really wanted in the end. he wanted to turn a 7 year friendship into shit and abandon the one person who would have stayed by his side... who stood by his side. so i just have to do something else. not give myself totally to a person. to believe in them when everyone doubts him. that at least i kept true to myself and i didn't move there. i think he always hated me for that. but now he won't have to deal with my ideas and he won't have to worry about me climbing into his arms again. goodbye the old drea: the dreamer, the mother, the wife, the therapist... hello new drea!

i cannot thank my friends enough. that i didn't lose ya'll. i just wish that he would have loved me more. loved me in the way that i used to love him. but you can't make someone love you.

well last night i hung out with kaleo and it was nice. we ate pizza and watched a movie. it's nice to hang out on a "school night." this morning my mom said that she was proud of me. that i am doing well with the breakup. and pretty much i don't have a choice. either you move on or your lost. i perfer to move on. not to mention maybe things were supposed to end. i just wish that honestly would have come before fear with him. but we are all in control of our actions. we can choose to do it the right or the wrong way. and i will do things right.

work is work. i just can't help but want to escape around 3. but i have to stay. i don't mind it, just wish i had a actual long vacation. but i am stil planning a trip to nyc. so if you wanna go for a weekend please let me know. i really want this to happen before the winter.

well ceci sent me an email and it made me think. about people in your life. how they enter and leave. for the past month i have felt sad. but cee helped me realise that maybe what we had was all there was. maybe we learned our lessons and that was it. no more romance. i hadn't thought of it that way before. that god may be taken someone out of my life to allow a new person to enter it. day by day i move on... it hurts, but i don't want to look back. people waste too much time dwelling in the past and i refuse to do that to myself anymore. i mourned of my relationship and i don't care to shed another tear. i loved with all my heart and i tried. in the end i have no regrets, except i loved to much for too long. i believe that everything happens for a reason. and one day it will reveal itself to me. whatever is meant to be will be.

well i have spent my day answering the phone and being cold. but i just can't wait to go home. recently i have been in the mood to drive around. which never really happens. lets see, i talked to cee last night. she had a great time @ disney. i only wish i could have been there. we promised that one day we would go together. work's ok, i am just sleepy. 2 more hours to go! omg!

kayla is getting better everyday and it makes me so happy. i was so scared that i would lose her. but she seems to be improving. this morning i had a dream about V. i didn't like it though; felt like he was invading my mind. but i figure to only have 2 dreams isn't that bad. i had alot more with my other Xs. tomorrow i have another play date and i am excited. we may go mini golfing or to a movie after his football game. i like having friends i swear i do. apparently there will be a harry potter theme park opening in 09. by then i should be able to face f.l. just the name orlando makes me sick. ewwww! although i love the parks. maybe i'll go when the park opens with some peeps. that way i can finally go to sea world.

today has been good. i can't help but smile knowing that i will be getting off of work soon. i'm happy today and i likes it! work was interesting. i can't wait to go home. well that is all. oh i am thinking about getting a tattoo. maybe a phi mu tattoo. we shall see!

i am just so pissed off at life right now. kayla still isn't better. mom dropped her off at the vet. her infection is worse and i have to pay more money. i just want to scream and cry. i just want everyone to understand how blue i am. that i miss my fuckin friend too, but because he was an ass i can't talk to him. because right now it hurts. i want him to be there for me, but i can't trust one word he says. i was in love a month ago, i was happy and now i feel bi-polar and i want satisfaction. i feel like the bride on kill bill. i just need to do something. i fuckin miss my friend too, but i don't know if i can ever have my old friend back. i hope that he reads this, maybe he will finally understand me. it isn't like i didn't tell him how i felt.

well kayla still isn't well so i am trying to contact the vet and see what is going on. well i got a phone call from the ex, like nothing ever happened. that he wants us to be friends NOW. and i just can't do that. i don't even know if i can be his friend later. i loved him and he left me. i wanted a future and well i never cuold figure out what he wanted. i just can't be his friend now. i call myself doing that i would hate him. and i rather take the time i need than sacrifice one more thing for him. i need this time to figure out what I need. i need a  truthful friend and unless he can truly be that then a friendship can't even exist in the future. but i just need to be myself for a while.

well i take in all the comments that are left by ya'll and i appreciate every one. truth is i did my best and he couldn't compromise even when i gave alot. truthfully that isn't right, most girls wouldn't did what i did for him. and he just punked out when it was time for him to really stand by my side. i wish that he would mature and figure out what he wants. i knew that family and friends were very important in my life and i wouldn't trade them for anything. once i have a bond with you it takes hell to get me from your side. and that is how i felt. i would have keept trying until i just couldn't anymore. i am that kind of person and friend. i don't give up, i guess that is why i have so many friends. things get difficult, you talk about it and try to agree. never abandon your fellow man, be selfless in life. my faith has taught me to sacrifice. and i followed my heart and did just that. when i look back i had no regrets, i kept every promise. i meant every kiss and every word. i wanted to be his wife, i wanted to be his support. and now i will never be those things. not because i cheated, or thought that he was worthless. it was because he didn't have the strength... something i thought that our love had.
everyone says give your heart some time and you will see where it leads you. maybe this is just a temporary seperation and maybe it is more than just that. i just can't wait, my heart cannot wait for him one more minute. he must want me, i cannot chase him. which is why i won't call, my heart can't bare to be rejected. to hear him not regret one thing that he said. i don't regret not going to f.l. every day i pride myself on it. i just really miss my old friend. the guy who was honest and caring, that last thing that friend would have done was abandon the one person who tried to believe in him the most. and i tried to believe, because i thought that he believed in me.
well enough of the blues i am gonna go to lunch with my gf-tia. it will give me some insight of the world and well it's great to see a friend. i just thank god for the strength he gives me every morning.

well my dog is sick. took her to the vet- thought she wouldn't make it. but she will be fine. she cought a viral infection and alot of damage could have been done. i am just glad that i won't lose her. to haev my relationship end and my dog die, would not have made me a very happy person. i don't know what i would have done. sometime i would have regreted no doubt. but now that the doc says that she will recover i feel better. tomorrow i have a lunch date with tia, and that makes me happy. so although a cloud hung over my head i managed to grab an umbrella just in the knick of time.

recently i have been thinking about him, i don't want to, but i do. i think what if some how he ends up in md again. what would i say what would i do? then i realise that he never wanted to come back, even if it was for me. i don't think that i will see him again. that makes me sad. i used to believe that our love was so strong, that it was meant to be, but maybe i was just a dreamer. maybe the whole thing was in my head. it's just strange looking back at my feelings i would have done many things for him. but i just wish that he could have done the same for me.

well right now i don't feel super great. kayla is sick and i really just want to go home. but at i do have many things to be greatful of. i really wish that kayla felt better. i just can't wait until i have this 3 day weekend to just relax and clear my head.

well today my head hurts, but i am ok. i am gonna go to lunch soon. that should make me feel better. sometimes i wish that i could just fast foward in life. that i could see what would happen. i just really miss the way my life used to be. now things are so complicated and it's foolish. i guess this is "bad time" but i know that good moments are sure to follow this "new situation." i just don't understand how love isn't more important than a career. or how a person can let the one person who loved so slip away. i guess some people don't value that feeling of home. to me that is the most important thing.

well my days have been going better, i have been trying to keep myself busy and just trying to move on. it can be hard to have someone in your life and then BAM it's done. i am just trying to make the best out of the situation. well the teen club is going well. we had our first bake sale and really earned lot of money. maybe we will have one every month. i am just trying to fill up my calander of weekends so i am always kept busy. and i am planning to do some traveling of places i've wanted to go. i wish that things didn't have to be this way, but i guess there isn't anything you can do when you never made that decision in the first place. when life gives you lemons you make lemonade. so that is what i am doing. making lemonade!

on friday i received a call from a certain someone and well it was difficult to have him say that i miss you. but all in the same breath not feel bad nor want to make things better. i tried to return his phone call yesterday and well he has not returned it. a part of me is worried as i used to be and another knows that he is fine, just that he doesn't want to speak or whatever. i just don't know how a girl like me ended up like this. with a guy who just one day made this huge decision and misses me and yet doesn't get it at all. all i needed was him to compromise and to love me. simple as that. and if he could then i would be in heaven, but instead he acts as if he is on a quest to save the recording industry and my heart was just a sacrfice of that war. i will not call him today i think that he knew that i phoned, just doesn't want ao answer. and that is fine, i needed some space after all i just wanted to tell him that i still cared and that i wish him luck. i guess good girls don't find what they are looking for. all they find are empty promises after they loved and sacrificed.

oh you may want to sit down and well i have bad news. well vince and i are not longer together and well it wasn't my decision and as i write this i cannot help but feel sad. and wonder how someone can cop out of a relationship when you really were in love. that i would have moved the world for him without a second thought and he decided that breaking up was simpler than managing me and his career. well i hope that he is happy and well i am not. and i am hurting and i didn't do anything, besides what i promised, but he broke his. he turned into a scared child when all i wanted was him to one day be my best friend for life. and now friendship the way things ended seems like impossible. how can be you be friends with someone who left you when you've given them everything. how can you? how you can be friends when you see them seperating themselves from you. i loved him with all of my heart and now my heart is broken, maybe i somehow deserved it. maybe i didn't all i know i just want to be happy again i hope that he knows what he has done. i just hope, because it hurts more than before. i can't get over this.

well today was a little better than yesterday. i am almost finished my protecting children program so i can advise the teen club. and of course vince is gone, but i have alum weekend to look forward to. and we did get into a fight actually the day he got here lol. but we ended on great terms and i  can' wait until he comes home for good. well my new job is going quite well, my office isn't set up, but at least everyone seems nice. i started looking at lamps and other things that i can put into my office. so i will be posting up pics when i find something that i really have to put up. of course ceci and my phi mu fam will have a frame of their own, but i really would like more pics with other sisters too. well i guess that is what alum weekend is for. today i was thinking about engagement. that the majority of the women i work with are married and how one day i will be ready to make that step. i want to be proposed to by m&ms. like buy the customized m&m's with marry me on them. that would be hella hot. well i gotta go. much love and enjoying a new environment.

well today is my last day of work and i am so happy and yet i find myself sad as well. i guess i will miss some and i do mean some of my co-workers. i also wish that i could have spent my morning sleeping instead of working. havin one day off sucks, although i am lucky to have that. my desk is pretty much cleared out except a pair of boots that i keep in a drawer, but i will bring those with me. so far i have finished all of my tasks and i am resisting the urge to play my d.s. i am a little nervous about my new job. that i hope that i will be happier and well that i will truely do my best. and i am nervous for my replacement. she only had 2 days of training when it really takes a week. not to mention she didn't even page anyone so her first day should be interesting. i just hope that my office has a window and that well i will fit in better that this job than my last. i need to finalize my reunion weekend plans... sorry liz about taking so long, but i haven't had time to talk to larhonda and ask her if we are still going together. i will probably X the crab dinner and do a family dinner instead. sushi sounds way better than f'in hamburgers and crabs that i won't eat.

tomorrow is my last day and although a part of me feels sad, i am so happy. a new chapter in my life will begin and i won't be looking back. today vince and i went to subway for lunch it was nice. we laughed alot and he may be coming over tonight, just to hang out. we are planning to see grindhouse on friday. so that should be fun. the new job starts monday.

well vince is gonna surprize me with a lunch date, super fun! and my last day of work is tomorrow. i plan to spend friday watching grindhouse and relaxing until i have to start work and say goodbye once again to vince. everything it getting better although i miss the old days of college. well i have some work to do.

well i had a few bumps in my weekend, but i'm glad that v is home. we ate dinner with ceci and ben, which was nice. we even went on a real date yesterday after church. i just hope that we can make it. i hope that things will be great when he comes home.

well today is good friday, so i have my first meeting as advisor of the teen club and v comes home tomorrow. i am a little nervous, but so excited. i hope that my meeting goes well. oh i made a new pair of earrings for pratice the next pair i will be selling. although i really need to start pricing my work. i just make it and end up underpricing it because i forgot how much i paid for the beads. today will be a long day.

well last night i went to confession and it went pretty suckie. 1st of all i didn't go to my church so i already felt out of place. and the priest totally digged into the pre-martial sex thing. what a way to feel like a ho when i go to confession to be forgiven for my sins. well, i think i'll stay away from that church, i prefer open minded catholics, those who won't say my boyfriend is a lier.

well kayla has been so sweet. she is such a cutie and having her around helps with the long distance thing. i just wish that today i could have stayed home and spent the day wih her. it's too gloomy outside to deal with stress.
well today isn't going too well and i just don't know where i belong. i just am upset.

well things are still on the rocks with vince and i. the phone is becoming a problem, i just don't want to talk on the phone. i am tired of this seperation where i have no clue what he is saying. i hate getting in fights because of miscommunication that could have been avoided if we could speak face to face. i just want things to be the way they were in college. to have a semi normal relationship and really be inlove and happy. i love vince, but how can you feel a gitty over someone you never see and beginning not to understand.

well last night kayla peed in my bed :(

thank you all my sister for your congrats. i loves ya'll and i hope to see you alum weekend. Oh cee and i are tryin to do a phi mu thang durin the summer we are workin on it.

i am sad though it seems that cee+me+disney=not gonna happen. our sched. isn't matching up so when i'm going she will be leaving. *sigh*. although it is possible to beg for a vegas trip. it would be a long ways from now. the end of this year or some time next year. although u know i wanna go there and just go crazy. that is a trip that everyone should take. well for now that is all. 

kayla is a pee pot. ceci and i will not be getting drunk and raping pocahontas. but i want to lose everything in vegas.

Oh kata, cee, liz, alex, thank ya'll for your support. hope to see ya soon.

these days i have been missing phi mu like crazy. it really was a big part of my life back in the day. well now a new thing will start aka a new job. i think that it will make life a tad better. the truth is i have no idea where i belong. in my spirit well i feel better being more involved in the teen club and church and stuff. i find myself praying quite a bit. and not on my knees just in my head just saying thank you. each morning i find myself saying thank you, something that i never did. but in love well i wish V were here and that sucks, but i couldn't have made him stay in md... i tried,  but alas he is far away and i am here. the distance is getting to us and i still need to buy tickets too i will look at some flights so i can buy the tickets next week. i will have to tell my job about the two days that i will miss because of it. at least it isn't a week.

YOU MAY BE WONDERING WHY I AM WRITING IN CAPITAL LETTERS AND THAT IS BECAUSE I GOT THE JOB! HOW STRANGE THAT I GET A JOB THAT I REALLY DIDN'T APPLY FOR. THAT SOMEHOW IT JUST HAPPENED. NOT ONLY AM I WORKING CLOSER TO HOME, BUT I AM GETTING PAID A LITTLE BIT MORE. NOT ALOT, BUT NO MORE METRO EVERYDAY TO WORK. AND I START ON 4/16. HOW NEAT. ALTHOUGH I DON'T REALLY GET ANY TIME OFF FOR MYSELF EXCEPT A FRIDAY THAT I HAVE TO GET A DOC PHYSICAL AND FILL OUT THE REMAINDER OF THE PAPER WORK. THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR YOUR THOUGHTS AND PRAYERS, BECAUSE IT WORKED! XOXO!

today it is almost time for me to leave and i am excited and nervous all at the same time. i guess it is normal though. i just hope that i don't have too much down time before my interview. i just want to go in with a smile and tell them how eager i am, although i do have questions regarding my duties. i need to make some things clear. but all and all i am just ready to get this thing goin. although i wish that i would have brought a sandwich.

today i have my interview and i am excited. i've prayed on it and that's it! althought it is a drag having to show up for work. but here i am putting on a smile and i shall get through the day. last night vince and i actually talked and it was so nice. it felt like things were getting better. i am trying to plan a picnic for he and i when he comes home. something quiet and romantic, something we haven't done before. speaking of vince SUSHI i want to do a double or triple date thing on april 14th. is anyone in for Kaz Bistro in D.C.? if i don't do the date now well it won't happen in a long time. i am just glad that things are getting better. i lost another pound too!

so phi mu formal happened already *tear* i miss those days. but ha i have more great moments to go. i really want to have a phi mu reunion though every year. like during the summmer so alums and sisters can actually hang out since sister+alums+alcohol=bad in some cases. but if it's not a sponsered event then HEY a good time. maybe cee and i should work on it together since we disucssed it like "years" ago.

i am working on my jewelry sketch book still i bought some materials weeks ago, so i am totally on a jewelry kick, but i don't have a torch or all of my supplies. but i know that things will get kickin during the summer.

kayla is WAY BETTER! she is jumping around and being loving again. i really love that puppy. she is my everything and i feel that vince and her may not get along. well that is between them to figure it out.

i am thinking about dying my hair to surprize V. i think that he will be shocked well if i can ever figure out a color. well that is all.

well i went to h&m during my lunch break and i bought a cream skirt designed by madonna. i bought a cream cardigan and another pair of black pants. of course the skirt costed the most. i didn't even get a chance to try it on. i bought a size 12 and well if my hips were an inch smaller it would have worked, so had to get a 14 :(, but in the regular stuff a 12 and even that wasn't skin tight, i have ROOM. but i am sad i tried to call vince again and his phone is off. i am just not going to call him anymore. i just hate that i try to phone him and NOTHING. i talk to his answering machine more than i talk to him these days. i just want to go home now. it's been a long day, not bad, just long. i just want to wash my hair and play the sims or to just drive around with the windows down. 

thank you liz for caring and i really hope that things get better. *sigh*

this morning i woke up LATE really late, like an hour. but i was so tired and it felt good. kayla is feeling alot better, she is turning into her old self. today she tried to follow me to my car and come to work with me. i really love that pup, april 14th is her birthday! two weeks until vince comes home and well he is sick. like last night we didn't even really talk. *sigh* things just seem to be getting better and better. somehow i hurt my knee, i dunno if i hit it or what, but it's been sore for like a day & 1/2. today i will go shopping at h&m i hope some of madonna's clothes are stil there. i would love to be rockin with the diva. look all hot in my work clothes and well i need a new outfit for my interview on tues. i am excited and scared all at the same time. i hope that i get it, but it's scary doing something new. well if it is meant to be it will happen. so far i am still losing weight. according to my scale at home i have lost 6 pounds, well according to my doc scale i have lost 10. i am able to wear size 12 pants again and my hips are a tab smaller. i still haven't lost the boobs though. ;) i hope to see the cherry blossom trees next week, maybe granny and i will go together. that would be nice. well i don't have that much to say, but i have been researching more jewelry stuff. i really want to get started with this during the summer; ceci and liz you guys better be ready i am totally serious about it.

well i write this because my girls will understand. recently vince has been well out of it, like not the same and i know it's probably stress and everything, but i miss my old boyfriend, the one who didn't act like a 1,000 year old man. the guy who could talk to me on the phone and actually be excited about virgin fest 2007. i miss my rocker not this old man river he has turned into. first thing vince says is it's gonna be expensive. WHO CARES we are young and it's the POLICE and SMASHING FUCKIN' PUMPKINS. recently things really haven't been great between he and i. vince says he's sick and stressed and well i hope that is the case. all i know is i miss my boyfriend. the guy that would love the idea to spend two days rockin out in the summer, he used to be so exciting and that's what i loved about him. vince was the one that got me all punked out and helped me "free" myself. and i just want him to be free too. this is frustrating and there isn't anything that any of ya'll can do. i'm not goin throgh a pms rant, i just want vince to be vince and not well his "dad." since my depression i've really wanted to begin living life. to enjoy my youth instead of living under a rock. i just want to enjoy the warm weather, dance in the rain, eat all the sushi i can, make out, and freakin rock out. i just want to smile these days... i just want to smile. i dunno i think that he is just stressed i love him, but i just want him to be happy again to be my little wing.

well kayla's operation was successful, but last night i didn't get much sleep since she was crying. she didn't like the anest. that was putting her to sleep and she was in discomfort. i just felt so bad and a part of me regrets getting her fixed i took away her ability to have babies, but i had to. i couldn't take care of her and her pups. and i wouldn't want to sell them to strangers. it would break my heart. right now she is still mad at me and she won't be back to normal until 2 weeks from now. i miss my kayla boo i miss her being happy.

well lack of sleep due to her cries has made it for an interesting day. i am just sleepy and i just want to crash. my day is better than yesterday, but i still don't feel like myself. maybe a nice hot bath will do me some good.

well today i just want to go home crawl up in a ball and cry. the culprit PMS, but it is brought on by other issues. work sucked today, wish i would have stayed home and i am worried about kayla and her surgery. i just wish that i could be there for her. that i could hold her little paw. instead i sit at a desk doing meaningless work. and when that work stresses me out i turn to vince who could not be reached by phone. i am kirk out. when he finally calls i just start crying and say that "i'm not happy" and "i'm tried of this." truthfully i just want to be a normal couple that sees each other, that can go to the movies and hold hands. the most action i've seen is from my dog. and even she gets fed up with me, so i am left feeling alone. in a office full of people i feel alone and i know that it's the hormones that make me engulf all sweets in sight and soon it will be over, but i am a little fed up with not being able to see someone you love. all the cute i miss yous have an underlying belly cry just waiting for alcohol to release them. i spend my life doing what's "right" when sometimes the wrong things will make me happy. just getting on a plane with kayla to see vince is what i want to do. but i don't do that planning is more important than happiness. and i don't just leave work for lunch and never come back although that is what i really want to do sometimes.
my life is full of regrets of not doing the bad things. not skipping classes in high school, not calling out sick when i wasn't. i think sometimes i do things that are too good. i never really buy designer clothes when i can't afford them or deface public property. i am the nice girl that everyone knows won't do messed up things. and that isn't true. i hide her, but she lives deep inside. and right now she just wants to get a lighter place it near a sprinkler and have them go off all over the building; just because i saw it done in a movie. but i don't i just stare at the sprinkler and imagine what would happen if i did that. so i'll imagine many things from this desk and i will be the good girl.
I got a call back from my interview from yesterday!

well today has begun quite interesting, i spilled milk in my car, the milk i was going to eat my cereal with. i bought some more at cvs. but my weekend went well i gave the dog a bath, went to church, ate lunch/dinner with a co-worker at gracie's. they have great sushi and it was just nice to hang out with someone new. vince passed an important test, his certification for ProTools. So he will be graduating with a "b.a." that makes him very happy and i am proud of him. vince and i still aren't perfect, but no one is that. it is just hard being apart and having the normal issues in your relationship. that most fight would be avoided if i could actually look into his eyes to know what he was saying. that sometimes i just get tired of talking i just want to lay in bed and do nothing at all; just lay and enjoy the moment. sometimes talking can be so overrated.
